translated: Sancho I of Portugal said the Founder, the Popular or, most often, the colonizer (born November 11, 1154 in Coimbra and died March 26, 1212 in the same city), was king of Portugal in 1185 to his death.
original: Sanche Ier de Portugal dit le Fondateur, le Populaire ou, le plus souvent, le Colonisateur (né le 11 novembre 1154 à Coimbra et décédé le 26 mars 1212 dans la même ville), fut roi de Portugal de 1185 à sa mort.
